attributes.action: Change the new handball ruling so it’s actually handball not ballhand.
attributes.additional_details: Because they have a voice that is seemingly never ignored by the media.
attributes.background: To put pressure on the governing bodies of football to change the rule and to look at how rules are set full stop!

rejection.details: This is a matter for football's governing bodies, including the Premier League, English Football League, and Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
